Module ntnu.idatt1002
Package ntnu.idatt1002.controllers

Class NewEditTaskController

java.lang.Object
ntnu.idatt1002.controllers.NewEditTaskController
public class NewEditTaskController
extends java.lang.Object
A class which contains the buttons related to the creation of a new task.

  • Method Details

    • initializeNewTask

      public void initializeNewTask()
      Method used for initializing new task page.

    • initializeEditTask

      public void initializeEditTask​(Task task)
      Method for initializing edit task page.
      Parameters:
      task - the task that's going to be edited.

    • buttonAttachFiles

      public void buttonAttachFiles()
      A method which allows the user to choose and attach a file to a task. The method opens a file explorer window and lets the user choose a file. The chosen file will be added to a scrollPane.

    • addUpdateAttachedFiles

      public void addUpdateAttachedFiles​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list)
      A method which updates the attached files in vboxForFiles. This method takes a list of files and adds them to the vboxForFiles as buttons. These buttons all executes the fileOptionsPopup method when pressed.
      Parameters:
      list - the list of files which shall be added to the vbox.

    • fileOptionsPopup

      public void fileOptionsPopup​(java.lang.String filePath) throws java.io.IOException
      A method which opens a popup window. This window contains buttons for opening a attached file, removing a file from task and closing the window.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the filePath of the file one shall open the popup window for.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • buttonCancelTask

      public void buttonCancelTask() throws java.io.IOException
      Cancel button loads the tasks page back into center-content of dashboard.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • buttonNewTask

      public void buttonNewTask() throws java.io.IOException
      Method that uses TaskService to add a new task to the current user.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • buttonEditTask

      public void buttonEditTask​(Task task) throws java.io.IOException
      When editButton is clicked, we delete the old task and make a new one.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • addEditTask

      public void addEditTask​(Task oldTask) throws java.io.IOException
      Method used for adding a new task or editing. When adding a new task, the task is created. When editing, the task with same id will be overridden.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • buttonSimpleTemplate

      public void buttonSimpleTemplate()
      Method for setting some nodes false, to simplify interface.

    • buttonAdvancedTemplate

      public void buttonAdvancedTemplate()
      Method for activating nodes, to show more functionality.

    • clickPriority

      public void clickPriority​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      When priorityMenuItem is clicked, we change the priorityMenuButton to the selection.
      Parameters:
      event -
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

      public void clickRepeat​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      When RepeatMenuItem is clicked, we change the RepeatMenuButton to the selection.
      Parameters:
      event -
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • populateProjectMenu

      public void populateProjectMenu()
      Method for populating the project menu button with menuItems

    • populateCategoryButton

      public void populateCategoryButton​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> categories, java.lang.String currentlySelectedCategory)
      Method for populating the categoryMenuButton with categories.
      Parameters:
      categories - A menuitem is added corresponding to each element in categories arraylist
      currentlySelectedCategory - The initial text of category is set to currentlySelectedCategory parameter

    • setColor

      public void setColor​(java.lang.String color)
      A method to set the color.
      Parameters:
      color - the new color.

    • setListOfFiles

      public void setListOfFiles​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> attachedFiles)
      A method to set the listOfFiles.
      Parameters:
      attachedFiles - the attachedFiles which listOfFiles shall be set to.

    • setTaskWithFiles

      public void setTaskWithFiles​(Task task)
      A method to set the TaskWithFiles.
      Parameters:
      task - the task which has files attached.

    • onKeyPressed

      Press new task button if enter is pressed.
